get_entry_picks

Source: R/entry_functions.R
get_entry_picks.Rd

This function fetches player picks for a Fantasy Premier League entry given the entry ID and GW. IMPORTANT NOTE: FPL generally asks scrapers NOT to abuse the /entry sites (see: https://fantasy.premierleague.com/robots.txt).

get_entry_picks(entryid = NULL, gw = NULL)

Arguments

entryid

The entry ID(s). Can be found on the FPL website under 'Gameweek history' in the URL - https://fantasy.premierleague.com/a/entry/XXXXXX/history.
gw

The GW for which player picks is requested

Examples

get_entry_picks(1076,31)
#> $active_chip
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $automatic_subs
#> list()
#> 
#> $entry_history
